root.name: Adrenix
root.description: You take on the role as the ace pilot Scott Griffon, an ex-MedTech employee who joined a terrorist group after MedTech kidnapped his girlfriend.Your new allies have provided you with a top of the line fighter ship, and you have to shoot your way through subways, harbors and city streets in order to save your girlfriend and put an end to MedTech's genetic experiments.
